articles.title: The University of California has fully divested from fossil fuels. It's the largest school in the US to do it
articles.description: On Tuesday, the University of California -- one of the largest systems in the country -- announced it had divested completely from fossil fuels, after selling more than $1 billion in assets from its pension, endowment and working capital pools.
